entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error when attempting to create a new MAUI project #24418
  • App crash in Release Mode when binding ItemSource in CollectionView #24416
  • Shadows not rendering as expected on Android and iOS #24414
    9.0-rc2

Closed

  • Make the MergedStyle and its property Style (that is of type IStyle) public #24257
    9.0-rc1
  • Add support for `TextAlignment.Justify` #24373
    9.0-rc1
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24386
    9.0-rc1
  • On ios, if IsReadOnly is true, the Editor will not be able to scroll #19500
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Keyboard events are not firing anymore #24295
    9.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Add `WindowsBatchPropertyMapper` to save unnecessary work when initializing views #24417
    community ✨
  • Fix shadow consistency on Android and iOS #24415
    community ✨

Merged

  • Add support for `TextAlignment.Justify` - fix #24376
    community ✨, 9.0-rc1
  • Use older JS API for HybridWebView test code and wait longer for web view to be ready #24408
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Add Styleable Element to simplify styling for external libraries #24387
    9.0-rc1
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24342
    9.0-rc1

Updated

  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
    9.0-rc1
  • [XC] Fallback to reflection-based bindings for bindings with "invalid" path #24238
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    9.0-rc1
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-rc2
  • Run device tests on the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area-xaml, community ✨, stale, t/perf
